name: GraphQL Tool
semantic_context: Makes a GraphQL request and returns the received data
natural_language_description: 这是 GraphQL Tool 节点。主要用于: Makes a GraphQL request and returns the received data

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Makes a GraphQL request and returns the received data
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Makes a GraphQL request and returns the received data | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: The way to authenticate | 默认值: none

requestMethod.name: requestMethod
requestMethod.description: The underlying HTTP request method to use
requestMethod.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTTP Request Method | 作用: The underlying HTTP request method to use | 默认值: POST

endpoint.name: endpoint
endpoint.natural_language_description: 参数名: Endpoint | 作用: The GraphQL endpoint | (必填项)

allowUnauthorizedCerts.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
allowUnauthorizedCerts.description: Whether to download the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
allowUnauthorizedCerts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ignore SSL Issues (Insecure) | 作用: Whether to download the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible | 默认值: False

requestFormat.name: requestFormat
requestFormat.description: The request format for the query payload
requestFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Format | 作用: The request format for the query payload | 默认值: json | (必填项)
available_options: JSON (Recommended) (值: json) - JSON object with query, variables, and operationName properties. The standard and most widely supported format for GraphQL requests.
GraphQL (Raw) (值: graphql) - Raw GraphQL query string. Not all servers support this format. Use JSON for better compatibility.

query.name: query
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: GraphQL query | (必填项)

variables.name: variables
variables.natural_language_description: 参数名: Variables | 作用: Query variables as JSON object

operationName.name: operationName
operationName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation Name | 作用: Name of operation to execute

responseFormat.name: responseFormat
responseFormat.description: The format in which the data gets returned from the URL
responseFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Format | 作用: The format in which the data gets returned from the URL | 默认值: json

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the property to which to write the response data
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Data Property Name | 作用: Name of the property to which to write the response data | 默认值: data | (必填项)

headerParametersUi.name: headerParametersUi
headerParametersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 作用: The headers to send | 默认值: {}
